data.name: Heldenhammer's Fury
data.description: Prayer of Righteousness now deals X spirit damage.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 424 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Avatar of Sigmar
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet gain a X morale bonus to strength, willpower, toughness, initiative, weapon skill, ballistic skill, and intelligence for 30 seconds.

data.name: Bludgeon
data.description: A powerful attack which deals X physical damage to your enemy.

data.name: Breath of Sigmar
data.description: Resurrects a fallen ally with 20% health.

data.name: Castigation
data.description: A strike that deals X physical damage to your enemy, and an additional Y physical damage over 10 seconds, and causes target to take a (2 * rank) ability penalty to initiative.

data.name: Charged Fury
data.description: Attacks which generate righteous fury will now generate 10 additional points.

data.name: Cleansing Power
data.description: When you use Purify on an ally instead of on yourself, it will additionally cleanse all group members within 100 feet of you, but this will not affect you. It will not cleanse more than 1 effect per target.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to willpower.

data.name: Divine Aegis
data.description: Restores 240 health over 7 seconds, and gain a 1320 morale bonus to armor.

data.name: Divine Aid
data.description: Heals an ally for X points, and an additional Y over 5 seconds.

data.name: Divine Amazement
data.description: You call upon the power of Sigmar, dealing 300 damage every second to all enemies in a 10 feet area around you for the next 4 seconds. Sigmar returns all the damage done to your enemies to you as health.

data.name: Divine Assault
data.description:
You repeatedly assault an enemy, attacking their very spirit and offering it up to Sigmar's will. You strike the target up to four times over 3 seconds, dealing X spirit damage per hit. Each hit heals your defensive target for 350% of the damage that was dealt.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Righteous Fury.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Divine Light
data.description: Your group mates within 100 feet become surrounded by a magical barrier for 10 seconds, which will absorb up to X damage for each person.

data.name: Mend
data.description: A quick heal that restores X health. Not affected by cooldown modification abilities.

data.name: Divine Petitioning
data.description: Beyond Reproach (PH) no longer requires a shield to be used. In addition, its cooldown is reduced to 15s if you are wearing a shield.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Divine Replenishment
data.description: Your group mates within 100 feet become more driven. For the next 10 seconds, anytime they hit an enemy with a melee attack, they will regain 50 action points.

data.name: Divine Reward
data.description: After healing an ally with Divine Aid or Healing Hand, there is a 25% chance that your next attack will not cost any action points.

data.name: Divine Shock
data.description: The force of Sigmar's displeasure slams into all enemies in front of you, up to 30 feet away, and sends them flying backwards.

data.name: Divine Warding
data.description: There is a 25% chance each time you cast Touch of the Divine, Sigmar's Radiance, Martyr's Blessing, or Twin-Tailed Blow, you will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 30 seconds which will absorb up to X damage.

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Endless Guilt
data.description: The snare from Weight Of Guilt will now last for 10 seconds, and affects all enemies within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Exalted Defenses
data.description: Any time you defend against an attack, your healing abilities will become 20% more effective for 10 seconds.

data.name: Fanaticism
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 10% and your chance to parry by 10%, but you can no longer cast Touch of the Divine, Purify, or Breath of Sigmar.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Fueled Fury
data.description: Whenever you are hit by an enemy, you have a 25% chance to gain 35 righteous fury. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Gift of Life
data.description: All of your group mates within 100 feet gain a 1320 morale bonus to armor, a 512 morale bonus to all resistances, +25% block, +25% parry, +25% dodge, and +25% disrupt for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Greave of Sigmar
data.description: Sigmar's Fist will now also apply (3 * rank) ability bonus to toughness, and will cause the target enemy to take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to strength and toughness.

data.name: Hammer of Sigmar
data.description: Deals X physical damage to the target, If the target is below 50% hit points, instead inflicts Y physical damage and will always critically hit.

data.name: Hastened Divinity
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed will be increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Healing Hand
data.description: Heals your target for X points over 15 seconds.

data.name: Judgement
data.description: You call down the holy judgement of Sigmar, dealing X spirit damage to the enemy.

data.name: Leading the Prayer
data.description: Whenever Prayer Of Devotion heals one of your groupmates, you will also become healed for the same amount.

data.name: Martyr's Blessing
data.note:
Requires Shield.
Requires 20 Righteous Fury per second
data.description:
You open your soul to Sigmar and become a living force of holy power for up to 3 seconds, as long as you maintain your concentration. Each second, all allies within 30 feet of you will regain X health, and you will consume 20 Righteous Fury. All snares are removed on cast and you are immune to them for the duration.
This effect will end if you lose your concentration or if you run out of Righteous Fury.

data.name: Penance
data.description: You attack all targets within 30 feet for 1200 damage and stagger them for 6 seconds,preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Pious Restoration
data.description: You call upon Sigmar to bless everyone in your group within 100 feet, restoring X health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Prayer of Absolution
data.note: Only one Prayer may be active at a time.
data.description: You chant a bolstering prayer, granting a X ability bonus to armor to group mates who stay within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Prayer of Devotion
data.note: Only one Prayer may be active at a time.
data.description: Any time a groupmate within 100 feet of you attacks an enemy, there is a 20% chance that they will regain X health.

data.name: Prayer of Righteousness
data.note: Only one Prayer may be active at a time.
data.description: Any time one of your groupmates within 100 feet hits an enemy, there is a 20% chance they will deal an additional X spirit damage.

data.name: Purge
data.note:
Builds 25 Righteous Fury
Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one enchantment from your enemy and does X physical damage.

data.name: Purify
data.note:
Requires 25 Righteous Fury
Target must be Cursed or Hexed
data.description: You purify an ally, removing one curse or hex.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Refreshing Radiance
data.description: There is a 25% chance any time that an ally is healed by a Path of Salvation ability that they will regain 50 action points, but this effect will not work on you.

data.name: Repent
data.description: You detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 action points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Shield of Faith
data.description: Increases your chance to disrupt enemy spells by 10%.

data.name: Sigmar's Favor
data.description: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain an additional 135 hit points as well.

data.name: Sigmar's Fist
data.description: A blessed attack which deals X physical damage to your target, your defensive target gains a (3 * rank) ability bonus to strength for 20 seconds.

data.name: Sigmar's Grace
data.description: The might of Sigmar infuses everyone in your group within 30 feet, granting a (2 * rank) ability bonus to wounds for 1 hour.

data.name: Sigmar's Radiance
data.description: You smash into your enemy, dealing X physical damage to them. The power of Sigmar erupts from your weapon, healing any of your groupmates within 100 feet for Y health plus 50% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Sigmar's Shield
data.description: You smash your weapon into your enemy, dealing X physical damage to them. Your defensive target becomes blessed for up to 10 seconds, and will regain Y health each time they're attacked. You will lose 15 righteous fury every second, and the effect will end if you run out of righteous fury to power it with.

data.name: Sigmar's Vision
data.description: Deals X physical damage to your enemy and blesses your defensive target for 15 seconds, increasing their chance to parry attacks by 10%.

data.name: Smite
data.note: Builds 15 Righteous Fury per enemy hit
data.description: A sweeping blow which deals X physical damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 50 feet away.

data.name: Soulfire
data.description: When deal X spirit damage to enemies within 30ft of you every 3 seconds. Dring this time all Path of Wrath abilities will deal 25% more damage. This ability will end if used again or if you run of Righteous Fury with which to power it.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: All of your heals will cause enemy monsters to hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Supplication
data.description: For the next 5 seconds, you will convert 30 action points into 30 righteous fury every second. If you run out of action points or break your concentration, this effect will end.

data.name: Touch of the Divine
data.description: Restores X health to all group mates within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Unwavering Faith
data.description: Gain a 252 unique bonus to spirit resistance.

data.name: Vow of Silence
data.description: A powerful strike which deals X physical damage to your enemy and knocks the wind out of them for 4 seconds, silencing them and making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Weight of Guilt
data.description: Deals X physical damage to your target. If they are cursed, then they will also become snared, reducing their run speed by 40% for 6 seconds.

data.name: Beyond Reproach (PH)
data.description: You detaunt all enemies within 30 feet of you, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Spirit of the Heldenhammer (PH)
data.description:
You channel Sigmar's spirit through your body in order to heal your target for X every second for 5s. You take X morale damage every second, and you cannot be healed for the duration.

You will also gain 30% movement speed for the duration if you have a shield equipped.

data.name: Lay on Hands (PH)
data.description: Healing Hand now only costs 15 Righteous Fury.

data.name: Absence of Faith
data.description: You call upon Sigmar to curse your enemy dealing X spirit damage. For the next ten seconds, all healing the target received will be 50% less effective.

data.name: Twin-Tailed Blow (PH)
data.description: Deals X physical damage. You are healed for Y% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Guilty Soul
data.description: Anytime you critically hit an enemy with a direct damage ability from the Path of Wrath, you will deal X additional spirit damage. The target will take another Y spirit damage over 9s.

data.name: Unberogen Creed (PH)
data.description: Sigmar's Radiance can now strike a target from 30 feet away.
